title: Royal Allegiance Esports looking for Support players for competitive play
body:
Royal Allegiance Esports are on the lookout for serious players to come together and break into the competitive scene. We are looking for highly skilled and motivated players to join our roster in the pursuit of OPL in 2017. All positions available.
We will also be competing in the Oceanic Open Ladder (OOL) tournament.
Player prerequisites:
-Must have stable Internet connection
-Must have voice comms
-Must be available to play thursday 7pm - 10Aest and Saturday and Sundays 11am-4pm AEST as these are the times tournaments will be played.
-Preferably d4+ but will consider high plat
Please fill out the above form to apply

replies.body:
IGN: pu55y d3stroy3r
Rank: silver 4

Add me in game if you're interested
